translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽. The Chapter with Mandāravapuppha as the Foremost
staying on the bank of the Ganges,
In the past, twenty-eight eons ago,
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā uddālakapupphiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmai uddālakapupphiyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: … the Buddha’s instruction has been done.” 🔽Thus the elder Uddālakapupphiya recited these verses.
The seventh section for recitation on the elder Uddālakapupphiya is finished.
